articles.title: Venus is leaking carbon and oxygen, and scientists aren't totally sure why - Livescience.com
articles.description: Observations of Venus taken with the BepiColombo space probe show that our cosmic neighbor is leaking significant amounts of carbon and oxygen from its atmosphere, and researchers can't totally explain why.
